name: One Night in The Alps - DEMO
name_original: One Night in The Alps - DEMO
description:
An interactive story game that I have created as part of a 72 Hour Game Jam revolving around the theme of "Entering the Unknown" 

I guess having to explain why it fits the theme just means that it doesn't fit the theme that well... but this is my first time doing this sort of thing.... so.....

One Night in The Alps is an interactive story game about travelling to a new (unknown) place in search of closure, I'll let you learn more by playing!

(This game is unfinished, and as the title says this is just a demo for it)
